title: Soraka and Zhonya's: Interesting visual bug.
body:
PREFACE: I can't find a picture that doesn't show a summoner name online, I don't have any sort of photo editing program, and I'm lazy, so there's no picture. Sorry about that, go take 5 minutes and see it for yourself.

Soraka, when using Zhonya's.... turns blue, instead of gold. Enjoy it while you can, it's amazing.



Side note: This was found four months ago by a PBE user. http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bugs/UfJ6PLeX-blue-zhonyas

replies.body:
Hiya The Lord of Dome! 

So you're right! 

Generally, a blue texture means there's a missing texture, in this case, the golden Zhonya's texture.  I was able to reproduce with without disconnecting/reconnecting. 

I'm going to dig a bit more and see what's going on here. Thanks for the report!
I say leave the bug because that color works on soraka.
I call to make this a feature!
That actually looks really good, compared to the Yellow Texture we have for Zhoynas.

I hate to piggyback onto this but could you let me know if anyone is aware of this bug or if it's being looked into at all? It happens pretty frequently and has a big impact on gameplay...

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sqewsTcA-gameplay-cursor-stuck-on-blue-crosshairs-after-spamming-spells-unable-to-ping

If you read the comments in the link you posted you'd see it's not really a bug, it's more of an issue with your game not loading the files properly. Reconnecting to the game will usually fix it and it can happen with waaaay more things than just Soraka zhonyas.
That's what everyone told this person... except it's not a problem on my end, but the server's. Everyone has this problem, try it yourself.
inb4 riot releases chroma skins for zhyonas.
